General.Name: HEMARAJ INDUSTRIAL PROPERTY AND LEASEHOLD FUND
General.Description: Hemaraj Industrial Property and Leasehold Fund specializes in acquiring and leasing the property. It includes freehold and leasehold, ownership and freehold rights of land and factories.
